maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: NUDS-Hoard records generated by Ethan Gruber from spreadsheets Disnarda Pinilla cleaned from the IGCH records.s
Record revised to include coin type URIs in contents.

disposition.description: New York 37 (Lysimachus 28, Attalus I 1, Antiochus II 6, Antiochus III 2)

nuds:type.nuds:description: Diademed head of deified Alexander the Great with horn of Ammon, right.
Athena (Nikephoros) seated left, holding Nike and spear; shield behind.

refDesc.reference: Seyrig, RN 1963, p. 26, note 1 (210-205 B.C.). The Pergamene series includes coins of Eumenes II
